summary: This document is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York inmate roster generated on July 24, 2019. It lists hundreds of inmates with details like name, register number, housing location, and admission date. The roster includes Jeffrey Epstein, who was in custody at the time, and other notable inmates like Sayfullo Saipov and Cesar Sayoc.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate in the MCC New York roster with admission date July 8, 2019, under register number HOLA H01-001L. He was in federal custody at the time.

persons.name: Sayfullo Saipov
persons.context: Listed as an inmate in the MCC New York roster with admission date November 1, 2017. He is the convicted perpetrator of the 2017 New York City truck attack.

persons.name: Cesar Sayoc
persons.context: Listed as an inmate in the MCC New York roster with admission date March 26, 2019. He is the perpetrator of the 2018 United States mail bombing attempts.

persons.name: Joshua Schulte
persons.context: Listed as an inmate in the MCC New York roster with admission date May 2, 2019. He is a former CIA officer convicted of leaking classified information.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Admission to MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was admitted to the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, as reflected in the prison roster.

events.title: Prison Roster Generation
events.description: A comprehensive inmate roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, was generated, listing all current inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was listed as an inmate at MCC New York with an admission date of July 8, 2019, confirming he was in federal custody at that time.
The document is a standard prison roster, not a case-specific legal document, showing the general inmate population.
The roster includes other high-profile inmates like Sayfullo Saipov and Cesar Sayoc, indicating it is a comprehensive list of the facility's population.
The roster was generated on July 24, 2019, which was after Epstein's arrest (July 6, 2019) and before his death (August 10, 2019).
The document provides no information about the specific charges, legal proceedings, or alleged activities of Jeffrey Epstein; it is purely an administrative record.
